message: OpenSplitBot helps you and your friends to organise your group expenses. The following commands are available:

commands.balance: Show the group balance, if it's called inside a group. If it's called in a private chat, shows the user's balances in each of their groups
commands.add_expense: Add new expense to the group account. Only available inside groups.
commands.calculate_exchanges: Shows the least number of money exchanges to balance the group account. Only available inside groups
